name: Cube Juice
description:
Cube Juice

Cube juice is a small game made using Godot for the Godot Wild Jam #43.  Instructions on how to play are included in the game (Menu > Help)

You control two cube types (red and blue) with WSD and Right, Up, and Down arrows. They are continuously spawning. If they collide with something, they are no-longer moveable. Your goal is to get them to the other side and combine them in the "blender". After all 11 levels have been completed, you will have x1 cube juice. You've done CubeJuice inc. proud!

If you find any bugs please tell me in the comments. Also include any feedback.

Known problems:

  1. Music not restarting in menu
  2. Executables not running due to them being renamed (fixed)

I simply didn't have enough time to fix it.

Also if anyone here uses linux or mac, please test out the game! I don't know if it exported correctly on those platforms and I have no way of checking.

Cube Juice is available on Windows, Mac and Linux.

Feel free to look through the source if you want to learn/see my horrible code!
